item.title: Ridiculous view movement when you keep hitting something with the crowbar by holding m1
item.dc:creator: Xilefian
item.description:
This probably isn’t a bug as all weapons feature a kick, however I would agree that it needs fixing. Apparently it is a bug!

It is fine for other weapons due to low fire-rate, however the crow-bar actually makes me feel sick (which is pretty impressive, I do virtual reality research as part of my job and they don’t even make me feel ill).

I would suggest either removing the kick or interpolating it into a smooth swing, so it is more like the camera represents the swing motion, rather than a kick-back (which doesn’t make much sense).
